jobs.title: Elementary Teacher K-5 Openings for the 25-26 school year (Full and Part Time)
jobs.status: Full Time and Part Time (please indicate on application if you are ONLY interested in Part Time positions)The salary for this position is assigned to the TT Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkTT Salary Schedule.WCSD will recognize no more than thirteen full time, complete years of previous teaching experience when placing on the TT Salary Schedule. To estimate possible step placement on the TT Salary Schedule, select following linkTT Step Placement Calculator.Minimum Requirements:Active Utah Early ChildhoodorElementary Teaching License. jobs.title: HVAC Mechanic or Mechanic Apprentice
jobs.status: Full Time, 40 hours per week (year round, 239 day calendar)Minimum Requirements forHVAC Mechanic:High school diploma or general education degree (GED) and completion of a certified HVAC/R training program at an accredited technical college (or equivalent); or equivalent combination of education and directly related experience is required.  5 years commercial HVAC experience preferred.Must have experience working on electric motors and starters of various sizes and voltages is required; knowledge of VFD's and ability to work with these systems is beneficial.  Must have and maintain a valid Utah Driver’s License.The salary for this position is assigned to Level 8 of the MN Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkMN Salary Schedule.Minimum Requirements forHVAC Mechanic Apprentice:High school diploma or general education degree (GED) and completion of a certified HVAC/R training program at an accredited technical college (or equivalent); or equivalent combination of education and directly related experience is required.   A training schedule is available on the HVAC Mechanice Apprentice job description.  Must have and maintain a valid Utah Driver’s License.The salary for this position may begin on lane 4 (or higher) of the MN Salary Schedule, dependent on the training schedule placement.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkMN Salary Schedule.Attachment(s):HVAC Mechanic Apprentice ADDENDUM.pdfHVAC Mechanic.pdfEmail To A FriendPrint Version

jobs.title: Learning Coach
jobs.status: Full Time, 1 FTEMinimum Requirements:An Active Professional level Utah Teaching License.  ESL endorsement would be beneficial.Must have successfully completed a minimum of 3 years general classroom teaching experience.  Candidates with WCSD teaching experience are preferred.As per the Utah State Board of Education, completion of LETRS training is required for all elementary learning coaches.  Starting in the 2023-24 school year, completion of the USBE Instructional Coaching Endorsement and WCSD Teacher Leader Endorsement are recommended within the first 3 years of service in this role.The salary for this position is assigned to the TT Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkTT Salary Schedule.Attachment(s):TSA Learning Coach.pdfEmail To A FriendPrint Version

jobs.title: Sub Bus Driver Trainee
jobs.status: On-Call/As NeededMinimum QualificationsMinimum age of 21 years.Have no more than 100 points recorded on past driving record.  No more than two at-fault accidents, two citations, or a combination of one at-fault accident and one citation, in a 24 month period.Hold and maintain a Utah Commercial Drivers License.  Driver Training will be provided if candidate needs to obtain the Utah Commercial Drivers License.The salary for this position is assigned to the BD Salary ScheduleAFTER completion of training.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkBD Salary Schedule.APPLICANTS ARE REQUIRED TO ATTACH/UPLOAD A COPY OF THEIR CURRENT DRIVING RECORD WITH THE APPLICATIONA copy of the driving record can be obtained from the Department of Motor Vehicles.Attachment(s):Bus Driver & Sub Bus Driver.pdfEmail To A FriendPrint Version

jobs.title: Head Drill Coach (no teaching assignment)
jobs.description: This Head Drill coaching assignment is for the 2025-2026 school year with no expectation of a teaching assignment.WCSD coaches are required to meet all UHSAA certification requirementspriorto starting assignment and are required to maintain certifications during duration of employment.If any additional questions, applicants can contact the Athletic Director, Paula Haws,  at paula.haws@washk12.org.A stipend will be provided for this assignment.
